posts.post_content:
I posted on the memorabilia side, but just in case some folks here don't go over there...

I won several programs from the last Hunt auction and was able to sell a few on eBay; trying to turn the rest into T206s if you got 'em.  I'll also accept cash offers.

Scored
8/5/1951 (first game) - Philadelphia Phillies vs Pittsburgh Pirates (Ashburn 0-5; Kiner 1-2 HR; autographed by winning pitcher Bubba Church) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/pittsburgh/web.jpg"]Scan1[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/pittsburgh-phi/web.jpg"]Scan2[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/pittsburgh-pit/web.jpg"]Scan3[/URL]
8/13/1951 - Philadelphia Athletics vs. New York Yankees (DiMaggio 3-5, Mize 0-4, Rizzuto 0-2) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/51athletics/web.jpg"]Scan1[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/51athletics-phi/web.jpg"]Scan2[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/51athletics-nyy/web.jpg"]Scan3[/URL]
4/27/1955 - Cleveland Indians vs. Washington Senators (cover is detached; 17 inning game scored through 4th; Doby 1-7, Kiner 0-5; Wynn) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/indians-scored/web.jpg"]Scan1[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/indians-scored-was/web.jpg"]Scan2[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/indians-scored-cle/web.jpg"]Scan3[/URL]
3/20/1958 (spring) - Cleveland Indians vs. San Francisco Giants (first spring as SF Giants; Mays 2-3, Cepeda 3-5) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/clev-spring/web.jpg"]Scan1[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/clev-spring-sf/web.jpg"]Scan2[/URL]
8/25/1961 - Chicago White Sox vs. Cleveland Indians (Fox 0-3, Aparacio 0-3) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/whitesox/web.jpg"]Scan1[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/whitesox-cle/web.jpg"]Scan2[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/whitesox-chi/web.jpg"]Scan3[/URL]
7/2/1962 - Cleveland Indians vs Baltimore Orioles (B. Robinson 0-3; Donovan throws 2 hit shutout) - Scan - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/62indians/web.jpg"]Scan1[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/62indians-bal/web.jpg"]Scan2[/URL] [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/62indians-cle/web.jpg"]Scan3[/URL]

Unscored
1955 Cleveland Indians vs Washington Senators (Wynn, Feller, Doby, Kiner, Lopez) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/55indians/web.jpg"]Scan
[/URL]1965 Los Angeles Angels vs Minnesota Twins (Killebrew) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/65angels/web.jpg"]Scan[/URL]
1967 Washington Senators vs New York Yankees (Mantle) - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100244/senators/web.jpg"]Scan[/URL]
